attributes.action: increase the speed limit to 50mph on all single carraigeways.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a LGV driver in rural England (Lincolnshire)I would like to see the speed limit for Lgv`s increased from 40mph to 50mph as a safty precaution.Other drivers get frustrated and risk overtaking which has resulted in many deaths over the past few years.
